awards:
[{'title': 'Georg Eckert Research Award 2022', 'description': "My book 'Echoing Events' was awarded with the Georg Eckert Research Award on December 2, 2022. The ceremony took place in Braunschweig (Germany). The award is endowed with a 5,000 EUR prize, subsidized by the Westermann Gruppe, and is handed out every two years by the Leibniz Institute for Educational Media | Georg Eckert Institute (GEI) for 'outstanding academic work in the field of international educational media research'. www.eur.nl/en/eshcc/news/tina-van-der-vlies-wins-georg-eckert-research-award and www.gei.de/en/research/publications/details/tina-van-der-vlies-echoing-events-the-perpetuation-of-national-narratives-in-english-and-dutch-history-textbooks-1920-2010", 'issuer': None, 'date': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, {'title': 'Research Prize 2021 | Erasmus University Rotterdam', 'description': 'To read and see more about the research prize and the opening of the new academic year 2021/2022: 
- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JWEuA0ZdwSg
- https://www.erasmusmagazine.nl/2021/09/07/onderwijsprijs-en-onderzoeksprijs-naar-eshcc/
- https://www.eur.nl/nieuws/dankzij-geschiedenisonderzoek-tina-van-der-vlies-kunnen-we-de-wereld-beter-begrijpen', 'issuer': None, 'date': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, {'title': 'Maurits de Vroede Prize 2019', 'description': 'I won the Maurits de Vroede Prize 2019 (a four-yearly prize) with my article ‘Multidirectional war narratives in history textbooks’, Paedagogica Historica 52, no. 3 (2016): 300-314.  De Vroede was the founder of ‘The Belgian-Dutch Society for the History of Education’ (BENGOO). The society’s award ceremony was on Friday May 10, 2019. 

Nice detail: the prize went to a woman for the first time. 

https://www.eur.nl/en/eshcc/news/tina-van-der-vlies-wins-maurits-de-vroede-prize-2019', 'issuer': None, 'date': {'month': 5, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, {'title': 'ISCHE Paper Prize 2014/2015', 'description': 'During the International Standing Conference for the History of Education (ISCHE) in Istanbul, from 24th to 27th June 2015, the Paper Prize was awarded for the best paper presented at the previous ISCHE conference. I received the Award for my paper "Multidirectional War Narratives in History Textbooks"​, presented at the ISCHE Conference "Education, War and Peace"​ in London in 2014.

See also: http://www.ische.org/about-ische/ische-early-career-paper-award/

', 'issuer': 'International Conference for the History of Education', 'date': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}}]

2019}}, 'company': 'Erasmus University Rotterdam', 'description': 'My successful PhD defense was on November 21, 2019.

NWO PhD project: "Echoing Events. The perpetuation of national narratives in English and Dutch history textbooks, 1920-2010".

This project studies cross-references between histories in English and Dutch textbooks, published for students in the first years of secondary education,1920-2010. I examine history textbooks as layered narratives in which stories of different periods and events overlap, interfuse and interact. The study of resonance patterns in history textbooks can reveal widespread frames of references and possible schemata in the narration of (national) history. 

Teaching:
CH 1102 – Rethinking History I
CH 1108 – BA-1 Paper
CH 2217 – Rethinking History II
CH 2010 – Statistics
CH 3020 – Historical Representation and Remediation

Coordinator Research Internships - Master History of Society', 'title': 'PhD Candidate and Lecturer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 1217316, 'name': 'DevelsteinCollege', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQFbWF12F_D_8w/company-logo_400_400/0/1519918058461?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=mYQujvtLeqe5dkR1VSjPgaYtyn00bm1PPDYFyLednl0', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/develsteincollege/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2011}}, 'company': 'DevelsteinCollege', 'description': None, 'title': 'History Teacher', 'employment_type': None}]}]
